Wisconsin Airlines Corporation Atlantic Coast Airlines and SkyWestR Airlines EFares are valid only for travel originating in the city or cities indicated only on the dates indicated and only in the direction indicated EFares are NOT eligible for upgrade to United First or United Business EFares are NOT eligible for the online booking bonus Seats are limited and may not be available on all flightsdates Purchase Requirements Reservations must be made using Uniteds Web site Tickets require immediate purchase by credit card when reservations are made CREDIT CARD OWNER MUST BE PRESENT AT AIRPORT CHECKIN TO SHOW THE CREDIT CARD USED TO PURCHASE THE TICKET AS WELL AS A VALID PICTURE ID Ticketing will be electronic using ETicket services Travel DaysDates Travel is permitted outbound on Saturday with inbound travel the following Monday or Tuesday MinMax Stay A Saturday night stay is required for all fares The maximum stay is days Additional TaxesFees Fares do not include a per flight segment tax A flight segment is defined as one takeoff and one landing Fares do not include Passenger Facilities Charges of up to which may be collected depending upon itinerary Fares do not include September th security fees of up to which may be collected depending on the itinerary In addition fares do not include a each way tax tofrom Alaska and Hawaii Canada fares do not include US departure agricultural immigrations customs taxessurcharges and fees of up to Itinerary Changes TICKETS ARE NONREFUNDABLE CHANGES ARE NOT PERMITTED ON THE OUTBOUND SEGMENT OF THE ITINERARY CHANGES WILL ONLY BE PERMITTED ON THE RETURN FLIGHT PROVIDING THE NEW ITINERARY IS WITHIN THE PARAMETERS OF THIS OFFER A SERVICE CHARGE FEE AND ADDITIONAL FARE IF APPLICABLE WILL BE CHARGED Stopovers circle trips open jaws oneway and open segments are not permitted with EFares Other Conditions Fares are subject to change without notice These fares may not be combined with any other discounts promotions or coupons Other restrictions may apply Lower fares may be available to select destinations Copyright United Air Lines Inc
